resources.string:
To clock in\out as a grading assistant, you are required the following: 
 
1. Verify identity by facial recognition.

To clock in\out as a teaching assistant, you are required the following: 
 
1. Verify identity by facial recognition.
 
2. Verify location by scanning a provided QR code.
Your account does not have enough face photos for facial recognition needed for clocking in and out.

This App was developed as part of a senior design project (fall 2015 - spring 2016) by Team Padawan: 
 
 Thang Le thangiee0@gmail.com
